name: Shadows - scarier than you think
description:
This is an endless run game where the objective is to score more and more points in this dark house, where disturbing shadows are trying to attack you!

A game based on Anxiety and Fear problems.

So, what are you waiting? Take your knife, Firestarter or Bat, and start to adventure yourself on this house!

Update: 1.0

Changes:

*Shadow Shooter now has a cooldown before shooting when the rooms starts

*Depression now can Change States while damaged

*Depression now changes States faster depending on the difficultye

*Now Esc returns to main menu. but doesn't save achievments

*Teaked Shadow's sounds

*Rooms are more random!

*New ScreenShots Added
